channel.title: 14 day trial?
channel.description: When did Runescape start this? Seems a little odd. Friend was starting for first time today and noticed that.

item.title: 14 day trial?
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

[quote=“m1lkman, post:21, topic:438880”][quote author=Daginith link=topic=541589.msg3970370#msg3970370 date=1334089904]

Horrible update, can only bank 300 addy arrows + a lot of other BS.

Ikr, even some F2P items. >_>

I really give up with jagex. They are really Killing Runescape.

RuneScape used to be a nice, fun community. Now its a shit company that could care less about the players, and only wants money.
[/quote]That’s the odd part. You know back in 06/07 there was an IN GAME community. This has pretty much died and everyone just pvm’s/solo trains/pvper-ish?.

While though the IN FORUMS community is still standing strong. Sort of reminds you of MITB huh? xD

Haha, yeah.

Back in '07 (i think) People would just hang out around the Lumbby castle, and talk.
Now the only way to talk to people is in a FC, or a CC.

Runescape used to feel like a ‘Family’ (so to speak). People were nicer, and it was all a good time.
Now, it feels like a company, no one talks, but everyone works.

And if you tell someone you finally completed Lost City, they laugh at you and call you a noob. :([/quote]
That quest used to be the shit back in the day.

Read full topic

Runescape used to feel like a ‘Family’ (so to speak). People were nicer, and it was all a good time.

item.title: 14 day trial?
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

[quote=“BloodRayne, post:12, topic:438880”][quote author=Daginith link=topic=541589.msg3967664#msg3967664 date=1333869445]

When did Runescape start this? Seems a little odd. Friend was starting for first time today and noticed that.

Yesterday.
[/quote]I don’t see a post about it 0.o

There was never any post about it because it’s not meant to be used by people already playing the game It’s just to give new players a look at what membership offers.

Also, it’s not membership like you and I know it, it’s quite limited. You’ve got access to the entire map, but are limited with things like GE offers, no more than 50 items in a stack, etc. This prevents people from using the free trial as a botting opportunity.

botted to 70 fishing, 70 WC, 80 FireMaking, and 60 mining. Also got 3m from killing chickens and picking up the feathers with a bot. In two days.
Gf, Jagex.

How long will this ‘free-YET-Hugely-Limited-membership’ last before Jagex gives up cuz of the botters? o.O

If you were able to deal with it that’s great, I just found it difficult having to work with the item stack limit, way too much effort just to bot a new account unless they’ve changed something since I did it?[/quote]
True, but the stack limit only applies to items in the bank…

So if tou keep the logs noted in your inv, and the bot does a ‘bank all’ you will have 300 logs in your bank.
the bot will then take from those logs,
So it runs pratically like any other bot would.

The only thing that is annoying is that for fishing and wood cutting, you cant keep all the logs or fish, so just drop them, if money isnt a huge deal.

Read full topic

item.title: 14 day trial?

There was never any post about it because it’s not meant to be used by people already playing the game It’s just to give new players a look at what membership offers.

Also, it’s not membership like you and I know it, it’s quite limited. You’ve got access to the entire map, but are limited with things like GE offers, no more than 50 items in a stack, etc. This prevents people from using the free trial as a botting opportunity.

botted to 70 fishing, 70 WC, 80 FireMaking, and 60 mining. Also got 3m from killing chickens and picking up the feathers with a bot. In two days.
Gf, Jagex.

How long will this ‘free-YET-Hugely-Limited-membership’ last before Jagex gives up cuz of the botters? o.O[/quote]

If you were able to deal with it that’s great, I just found it difficult having to work with the item stack limit, way too much effort just to bot a new account unless they’ve changed something since I did it?

Read full topic

Went on to buy my main 10% refer your friend bonus xp for a week that got kindof engrossed in the tutorial haha.
oh and by the way if anyone wants the account they can have it, I’m not going to use it members for like 41 days.
